TEXT.English: DLL incompatible with the savegame. The DLL needs to be recompiled with the same flags as was used when the game was saved.[NEWLINE]Required Flags:

TEXT.Spanish: DLL incompatible with the savegame. The DLL needs to be recompiled with the same flags as was used when the game was saved.[NEWLINE]Required Flags:

TEXT.English: Automatic turn export on and off at turn start[NEWLINE]A high number of traderoutes slows down the game and this feature allows disabling traderoutes when there is nothing to transport.[NEWLINE]It should be remembered that restarting exports will not take effect until the next turn. This mean it isn't well suited for cases where you both import and export at the same time.
TEXT.French: Àâòîìàòè÷åñêîå âêëþ÷åíèå è âûêëþ÷åíèå ýêñïîðòà ïðè çàïóñêå ïîâîðîòà[NEWLINE]áîëüøîå êîëè÷åñòâî òîðãîâûõ ïóòåé çàìåäëÿåò èãðó, è ýòà ôóíêöèÿ ïîçâîëÿåò îòêëþ÷èòü òîðãîâûå ïóòè, êîãäà íåò íè÷åãî äëÿ òðàíñïîðòèðîâêè.[NEWLINE]ñëåäóåò ïîìíèòü, ÷òî ïåðåçàïóñê ýêñïîðòà íå âñòóïèò â ñèëó äî ñëåäóþùåãî õîäà. Ýòî îçíà÷àåò, ÷òî îí íå î÷åíü õîðîøî ïîäõîäèò äëÿ ñëó÷àåâ, êîãäà âû îäíîâðåìåííî èìïîðòèðóåòå è ýêñïîðòèðóåòå.
TEXT.German: Automatic turn export on and off at turn start[NEWLINE]A high number of traderoutes slows down the game and this feature allows disabling traderoutes when there is nothing to transport.[NEWLINE]It should be remembered that restarting exports will not take effect until the next turn. This mean it isn't well suited for cases where you both import and export at the same time.
TEXT.Italian: Automatic turn export on and off at turn start[NEWLINE]A high number of traderoutes slows down the game and this feature allows disabling traderoutes when there is nothing to transport.[NEWLINE]It should be remembered that restarting exports will not take effect until the next turn. This mean it isn't well suited for cases where you both import and export at the same time.
TEXT.Spanish: Automatic turn export on and off at turn start[NEWLINE]A high number of traderoutes slows down the game and this feature allows disabling traderoutes when there is nothing to transport.[NEWLINE]It should be remembered that restarting exports will not take effect until the next turn. This mean it isn't well suited for cases where you both import and export at the same time.

TEXT.English: Reduce the minimum distance to other colonies by 1 if the player already owns the founding plot and all plots next to it (3x3 grid)

TEXT.Spanish: Reduce the minimum distance to other colonies by 1 if the player already owns the founding plot and all plots next to it (3x3 grid)
